sections.heading: Transition
sections.text: 714.28 Transition.—This chapter does not apply to a receivership for which the receiver was appointed before July 1, 2020.

sections.heading: Definitions. For the purposes of this chapter, the term:(1)“Affiliate” means:(a)With respect to an individual:1
